content: Great game, requires just enough brain power to make it feel like you've done something testing today!
What a great and entertaining game , really easy and fun to play too . Good job writers and devs üëåüèª
Overall nice game but a little small and easy
Wonderful game. Where are the other episodes?
Great game, hilarious! It's just super short....
So much fun! If you like puzzle games with an easy to follow and entertaining storyline, give it a try. And the cartoon graphics are just too cute!
Very cute.not funny, but very cute.
Charming Victorian sillyness. Well done guys. I am most impressed. Reminded me of the adventures of Sir Montague Blowhard of the RamRod coterie.
I thought this was fun but there's a glitch in the dark sewer area and I can't get back out. Restarted the app multiple times and I can't continue playing. So frustrating and disappointing.
Funny interesting storyline, cons are the gameplay moves and the fact that you have to buy another game to find out what happens next...
It is a nice game, but it is way too expensive for just one chapter. It lasted 1 hour! I will see the gameplay of chp 2 on YouTube. I'm not spending more $$ on second part.
Nor often a game gets a true five stars. But, with honest to goodness enjoyable gameplay and just plain, this one has earned it
Liked the puns.
I really loved this game! Fantastic dialogue, interesting characters & I really love the art style. Genuinely had me chuckling throughout. Crossing my fingers for a new one! :)
Combination of cartoon parody of Sherlock Holmes mystery and escape the room adventure game. Excellent entertainment for an hour or so, this episode contains 4 chapters.
Fun
Not very engaging. Weak plot and dialogue, and not much of any choice. The art is nice
What a fun game. I love that it is challenging but that I'd you forget something you don't have to redo everything or have negative consequences.

A hilarious game! A great point n click adventure with plenty of comedy. Well done voice acting that are silly all its own with some genuinely funny banter. The puzzles are not to hard but still challenging as I was stumped a couple times before putting two and two together. They give you an indicators for whats clickable with lots to check out that'll crack you up and plenty to do and explore with some interactive chase scenes that break up the norm. A comical story thats fun and mysterious!
Funny and entertaining brain teaser

It has bugs! At that ally when he is trying to jump that secret garden wall, suddenly another Betram enter and leave and game stuck! Nothing move anymore! People pay to play not to see what bugs do u have!!! I want a refund or at least u can solve the issue and eliminate the bug!
Tap control is off! Making this good game a nightmare to play 3 stars.
This has to be the funniest game ive ever played. Ive never laughed out loud when playing a game before except with this one. Highly recommended. Just download it right now. Now now.now
Fun game, easy to learn, the puzzles aren't too hard, humor's pretty good.

Loved this Game so much! The story line is fantastic and I just love the quirky humor and time period in which the game takes place. UPDATE Honestly one of the best point and click adventures I have played. Its been MANY months since I've played and I have not found a game as good as this.
This game is funny and good for all ages

Nice art and voice acting. The mechanics and gameplay are accurate and intuitive. The dialogs and story was fine. My only consern was the game length. I know this is supposed to be a game series but it seemed short and unfinished story even for an episode. If dev responds to this review in any way I'll make it 5 stars.

A very well-done game! The artistic design of this game is perfect! The dialogue and voice acting is extremely entertaining & funny. The only thing I can knock this game on is it's a bit short. The puzzles are easy and the chapter ends quickly. Aside from that, I love this game and I'd love to see more games like it.
the game is awesome, but it literally took me a few hours to finish. very short for a paid game.
greaft game
replyContent: It's out! :-)

content: I really enjoyed this game. Fantastic story, hilarious plot, talented voice actors. You can tell a lot really went into this and as a player, I gotta say, THANK YOU, DEVELOPERS! What a pleasure it was to play this.
Fun game but way too short to be worth buying.
I wish there was a confirmation prompt for skipping scenes and dialogue. I accidentally skipped comedic gold every time bumped the screen.

Really charming game! The artwork and soundtrack are really fun and the dialogue is probably the funniest I've seen in a long time. Full of innuendo, but so subtle and cleverly done. Only small thing is that I found the puzzles really quite easy. That said, I'll definitely be buying the next episode. And sure, it's short, but - 2 bucks - that's nothing for the amount of costs and resources that must have gone into making this. Well done!
Loved this game..lots of laughs..ready for part 2.
very fun and funny! lots of character.
One of the best P&C games on mobile. Nice combination of story, challenges, voice acting, graphics, and gameplay. A game that's worth your while and money.
Love it!!!
Challenging puzzles. Good cartoony graphics. And one of the best voive acting I've heard on a mobile game.
froze so i had to start again but fun game enjoyed it
to find the 2nd part type "fiddle episode"

Loved this hilarious game! Controls were easy to use for the most part on mobile Android 7.1, but game was hard to find in Google Play Store. I'd recommend for all ages, if you see ratings on Disney Movies? I love the English dark humor.
love this game.I hope they make several more games staring these 2 characters.
Unfortunately it's unplayable on my pixel.There is an offset on tapping on the X axis and I can never click where I want.
Like another user I'm also stuck in the dark alley. There's no interaction with the characters or the scene objects and no exit door.
Great game, but it's short as hell. About a half hour long if you aren't stupid or miss stuff. Worth a buck. When the 2nd installment is a buck, I'll get that too.
Great fun point and click adventure! You'll really want to carry on the story!
Great Adventures! Both were interesting. Episode 2 was a little glitchy towards the end but gameplay was not deeply affected. Anxiously awaiting episode 3.

Best game I've played in a long time. Very good story with good dialogue and VERY funny jokes on the rude side. And a good length game with 4-5 chapters. So good I'm paying ¬£3.99 for the sequel which is more than I would normally spend on a game. But game is so good I'm sure it will be worth it. I will review that one when finished.

I have always been a big fan of point and click since the days of monkey island and day of the tentacle. This game is very much in that style of wacky humor and interesting puzzles. If you enjoy point and click games I definitely suggest you pick up Bertram Fiddle.  Also the fact that there's audio for all the characters and not just word bubbles was really nice. A lot of value for the price tag.

Absolutely amazing. I especially love the lipsincing. Keep up the good

been put Into the animation. I haven't seen quality like this since the

this gamw really Rocks, this game us funny, adventurous and 1 thing is

Though a bit short and not quite satisfying, there is a lot to love about this little gem. Carefully animated, mechanically smooth, and with fully-realized, impressively polished voice acting, this is about as good as point-and-click gets on mobile.   Unfortunately, a few ill-considered minigames and a slight lack of interest in its own characters prevent this pocket-sized bauble from becoming a larger-than-life gem.
A very nice game! Nice graphics and dialogs ! Great work

Very well thought out game. It would be handy though to have some sort of 
manual as a task reminder. Perhaps a little notebook when one pauses the 
game. When is the next one going to be available?

I love this game. Keep putting more out like this.
Excellent game, genuinely funny.

The graphics and script (and the oooer missus humour) are quite good and well realised. The problem with the game I felt is that it is not very difficult. Tragically easy in fact. It's too linear and most of the problems given the player to solve are too much "on the nail". For instance Fiddle needs to trap his dog in a box. The box needs bait and the answer is? Well I won't say here but it really is far too obvious. The puzzles need more of a surreal bent imho (a slightly better one was solved spanning a holed floor...) I haven't played pt2 but I suspect it will be just as easy. A shame as the voice cast is really good and it's just about right for my level of humour.
Perfect Job ... Congratulations ...
I completed the first chapter. Great story its turning out to be. I shall go on to the next part...
Funniest game since Monkey Island 2.
This app didn't support Samsung S8 fulscreen

The game is well presented with nice art and voice acting, however, it's very short and can be completed in a couple of hours, in addition, it's very linear and items that you need to solve a puzzle are often just one or two screens away, in short, I wouldn't recommend it for any adventure game veteran.
Ahggg, I love this click and point adventure game. <3
Its a best game i played this year. The art style is syperb. Can we have the episode 2 coming out soon? plz
absolutely amazing! a quite short but sweet little click adventure game. i loved the fact that the characters lines were recorded and the quirky little jokes. i can't wait to play the second episode!
Fun story, fun gameplay, love the voice actors

A really nice game, It didn't take me a lot of time, but the story is too good ! And me, as a Sherlock Homes' fan, loved the fact he appears in the middle of the gameplay. I'm waiting for the Episode 2 :)

A fun, quirky, punny, but all too short game the has you on the trail of Geoff the Murderer. This is a point and click type game. If you're not a fan of those, you might still enjoy this game. It's neither too hard nor too easy. The graphics are awesome and the voiceovers are superb. In the future I will definitely be getting the next episodes.

content: Fun old school point and click. The dialogs are amusing, good voice acting. It's easy a bit too easy but  a phone game shouldn't be too hard. Good game

Great game, good introduction to the character's and game mechanics. Got a little frustrated being chased by the spectres. Graphics and voice acting are done well. With everything voice acted and ability to repeat what was said I found myself reading the words on screen and skipping through some of it. And it's got Sherlock Holmes.
I need episode 2 i cant stay alive without a game like this
Great game solving the mysteries, loved the theory of the game and too the voices of speech ,overall a good game.
I usually hate point and click games but this one was so entertaining..i loved it!!

Arcade sequences spoil this adventure.  The controls on arcade are difficult.  There is no excuse for arcade games in point and click.  At least give a way to turn them off, so those with less dexterity can play.  Presentation is amusing, but wish it wasn't so gory.  Need more non-horror gamed.
This is the best game can't wait to play part 2
This game is great. A true to form classic point and click adventure with silly story telling, and original voice acting.
Sad it had to end

content: Cannot tell me that this was the worst game created. It's the best. Seriously. The best. I can't wait for episode 2!
Great story line, funny dialogue and l was able to play in full without the need for hints. Looking forward to the next episode.
cant even get it payed for it
Great point and click game with a ton of elements and locations. Just hard enough and so far pretty long.
I want to finish this fantastic adventure puzzle game
Eagerly awaiting the second part! :)
Great story, animation & voices. Puzzles a bit easy for me and game was short but enjoyed it and will get the next one if it's as good or better

Extremely well made. Very funny and interesting characters with great graphics and an entertaining story. I'm glad there's still some devs out there that make high quality premium games instead of more of the same f2p garbage. Can't wait for episode 2. Is there a release date yet?
However it is cute, fun and has great dialogue
Awesome. Great voices!
What an enjoyable game, wish it was longer, though. I can't wait for the next chapter!
I was enjoying it, but then the backgrounds went black. I can still move around but I can only see the objects in the foreground.

Great graphics, atmosphere, voice acting and characters. If there is a gripe to this point and click game is that it was too easy and too short. Good price now, though. Roll on 2 - hope it's bigger and better.
When is episode 2 coming out?
Hilarious! Can't wait for episode two
Fun! One fini on ones own!
I love this game funny and fun to play I can't wait for the next chapter. Yes and I hope to see foofy too

Really love the style of the game really artistic and makes your thoughts running for all the possibilities. But it was too short. I finished it within an hour
You guys only give the best of games!

Loved it
It is hard to find games like this for Android. It was short, but good.  Looks fairly new, so I HOPE more will be made soon!
Can't wait till the next episode.  Super fun.

Fun, love art and voice acting. Can't wait for EP 2! I like that it's not too hard as I get stuck often in point and click games. I just discovered this is kick starter. I wish you have 1 million downloads so it will continue after EP 2. There's no other game like this one. I only hope ep 2 is longer Seb! PS. Although a bit short I do look forward to the others episodes. Enough of your perfiffery! Buy the game!

content: Loved the game, the funny names and the puns. Waiting for episode 2.

Great game! I can't for the 2nd episode!

LOVED IT. Its fantastic! The atmosphere, the characters, the humor, the gorgeous and quirky art style! Super interesting! BUT it really lacks PUZZLES. Cant wait for the next episode! :D
The best game
Good game but very short
Fun game, but too short
Really easy, mega short, not worth the money, wouldn't other with the next chapter
I enjoyed the game thoroughly but it felt a bit short. Feels like all the episodes are going to end up being overpriced. The voice actors, humor and the art work is fabulous.
This is the best ever adventure i had ! Story is hilarious and attractive, and British humour all the way. Highly recommended and I'm so desperately eager for the next episode!
Exactly my kind of game. Absolutely loved it
Random crashing. Not t able to continue due to glitches. I want my money back... It was pretty fun for about 3 min or so..
Love games like this episode two needs to be out soon!!
This game is really enjoyable and I've played it twice already. It was a bit short but I'd like to know how to get the second episode when it comes out.

Enjoyable game, if a little short. However there was no way to turn off the subtitles even though I deselected this in the settings. I found this rather distracting and it detracted from the game. Would need this to be sorted out before buying any further instalments.
When will the continuing part be released?:(
Fun game

I enjoyed playing this game up until chapter 3. When I got to the area that you have to use the diamond and monocle together, it would not allow me to combine the objects. I am apparently not the only person with this issue. Please fix it so that I can change the rating and finish the game.
I like this game indeed I do ,it's as it says funny interesting mystery unique & so on its kind of a have to see for yourself type but none the less worth it. .....want 2nd episode soon I'm hoping??
I love the animation and the story line. Good job creators!
Really fun and interesting game. Unfortunately it is shorter than I'd hoped. Can't wait for the next installamentalization.
Great game, cant wait for next episode.  2 dollars is certainly not too much for the quality& length. This & last door are the best adventures I played on Android.
Paid $2 for nothing. Not worth it. Beat it in a few hours. Cant get money back. Dont bother.

Awesome story! Can't wait for more

This is the best and funniest adventure game that I have played since the 1990s. Bertram Fiddle is such an interesting and likeable character. I read an article saying that this game is going to be three episodes long, but I hope that if it's popular enough, that we will get more.
Really wanted to play this, but it won't load on a Shield gaming tablet...black screen...
There's only 1 chapter out right now. It is good, but it's short. If the game was longer, then it would be worth the money.
Can't wait for next chapter
Beautiful game!

Hey please help me. I just got stuck in the dark alley somewhere inside chapter 3,when the man said "I can't see a thing" , then I can't move around. There are no hotspot to press, and i can't open my inventory. Please help me

If you like point and click, decent production values, punny fun and puzzles, give this game a shot. Word of warning, this is a short (and fairly simple) game and if it were more expensive I'd have given it a 4, but it's priced well. Also note episode two is in the making so don't expect a full closure to the story.
What great game with so much humor. What wonderful characters with silly interactions. I can't wait for the rest of the game.

I can't say anything bad about the actual game other than it was just way too easy. The graphics were beautiful, the characters- hilarious and everything worked so nice and smoothly. Hope there are more point and click adventure games coming but made to be way more challenging.
Don't touch me orridges! Haha~ A bit more challenge on next eps will be nice. This game runs smoothly on my samsung phablet.
gameplay is too easy but the story, humour and graphics largely compensate that. let's hope 2nd one will be more challenging!
Clever and funny! Can't wait for episode 2!
A new point and click favourite.  Subtitles can't be turned off in version 1.0, but I'm sure this'll be patched soon ;)
